RelatedSentence: Updated at 6:55 p.m. by Claire Cardona Dallas police have determined that a man in his 50 s died after being accidentally run over by a Frito - Lay delivery truck .

RelatedSentence: While he was inside , a man either sat or lay underneath the truck , police said .
The driver returned to the vehicle , sat for a moment and then drove off with the man still under the truck .
